movie_title: Why Don't We Shoot Nuclear Waste Into Space?
introduction:
The new 12,023 Human Era Calendar is here!
https://kgs.link/calendar
WORLDWIDE SHIPPING AVAILABLE.
T

vocabulary.example: The definition of nuclear waste is fuzzy and varies from country to country.
Scientists thought about yeeting nuclear waste into space as a solution.

vocabulary.definition: involving speeds greatly exceeding the speed of sound
vocabulary.example: The rockets carrying nuclear waste could crash from hypersonic speeds.
Nuclear power in its current form may only be a transitory technology.
Dealing with nuclear waste may seem challenging, but it's not insurmountable.

vocabulary.definition: very large in size or scale
vocabulary.example: We would need giant rockets to handle the disposal of nuclear waste in space.
